item.create.filter.tooltip.summary: _Matches items_ against a collection of _items_ or _other filters_ (Attribute and List filters). Can be used in _Filter Slots_ of some mods (Create, RS, MR, AE2 and Backpacks by default)
item.create.attribute_filter.tooltip.sum: _Matches items_ against a set of _attributes_ or _categories_, contains _Vault Hunters_ related attributes for sorting gear, jewels and more. Can be used in _Filter Slots_ of some mods (Create, RS, MR, AE2 and Backpacks by default). Multiple of these can be placed inside a _List Filter_.
